resources.string: The frictional force generated is %1$.2f N
The resultant weight force is %1$.2f N
The resultant specific gravity is %1$.2f N/m3

Newton's Law 3 says, Every action will cause a reaction. If an object exerts a force on another object, the object receiving the force will exert a force equal to the force received from the first object, but in the opposite direction.

NEWTON-3 application is an application that can calculate every action that results in a reaction. There are 3 types of Newton's Law, namely friction, gravity, and similar weight. 

This application is made to fulfill Assessment 1 - Mobpro 1.

Let\'s count the Laws of Action-Reaction!
